mapper.select: SELECT TABLE_CATALOG, TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_TYPE, ENGINE, VERSION, ROW_FORMAT, TABLE_ROWS, AVG_ROW_LENGTH, DATA_LENGTH, MAX_DATA_LENGTH, INDEX_LENGTH, DATA_FREE, `AUTO_INCREMENT`, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CHECK_TIME, TABLE_COLLATION, CHECKSUM, CREATE_OPTIONS, TABLE_COMMENT, MAX_INDEX_LENGTH, `TEMPORARY` FROM information_schema.TABLES where 1 = 1 and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'com' and TABLE_NAME = 'comtcadministcode'
